column4: i'm trying to get into my share on ubuntu 10.04.4 wich I used to be able to do, but now I cant, all I get is this error http://pastebin.com/jvGbsp3D any one know what went wrong?
can you ping the XBMC box?
yea, and I can putty to it, just cant access it's shares
what's changed since it did work?
all I did was deleting a folder within a shared folder, and restarting, nothing else that I can think of
no upgrades recently?
is the share completely open for guest access or is it password locked?

I did upgrade from 10.04 to 10.04.4, but that a little before the trouble, it should have password on it. I did ad a user to samba, and made a password to the XBMC access becouse of my android remote control
did you configure the share via samba.conf ?
yes, I added this http://paste.ubuntu.com/905872/
ah ok that's a guest enabled share then. so no password config. run 'testparm' on that box via SSH. also, what Windows version is it trying to connect to that share?
http://paste.ubuntu.com/905873/ i'm running win7
have you installed any Games for Windows Live recently? that sometimes breaks samba
nope, all I have installed for some days is Comodo internet security
ah well that could possibly be messing with things
I've used comodo for years, and never had any trouble with it :/
I tried disabling all services in comodo, and exit it, still get that damn error :/
almost sounds like it's not even running on the server end - tried restarting/starting the samba services?
I've tried restarting/stoping/starting the smbd and even reestarted and shutdown the PC, no luck there
clean starts and stops i take it? checked in the logs too?
explain "clean" starts and stops please?
no error messages spewing anger :D
ah lol, yeah clean start stop etc. no errors
this is the latest logs I have from samba http://paste.ubuntu.com/905910/
